parameters: I have been expecting you mr Peks
It is i. The great Rugy Rugo
I shal rule the day with my technological
I think the fuck not. This is my show.
Nananananana, You aren't getting away with this one nerge.
Would you like a hot beverage as a way to apologise
I happen to be a professional barista
Oh shit really, is this what you do when you dissapear for weeks at a time.
I can neither confirm nor deny
Sure, give me your best tea recipe you've got
\I[8] Tea is resident sleeper... I am more into coffee. The superior hot beverage.
Actually that last one doesnt sound as good
Ahh feeling particularly sharp are we?
Uhh. Okay. if you say so
OKAY FINE I WILL MAKE TEA
Dont expect it to be good though
I think you should at least try my blends.
POGGERS. it is done. here is your blend
Recieved the selected brew from Rugo
Well then. now you've enjoyed my amazing blends lets get down to buisness.
About time, i would like to still end this during the subathon at least.
i have prepared a few tasks for you to complete.
however. using my amazing knowledge. i have made them into difficult but challenging puzzles for you to complete
Rugo, why can't you just make it one and be done with it
Well i could. But where's the fun in that.
I made them myself with my genius scientific mind
Anyway. your first puzzle involves a abandoned house in a forest. Which is locked by a combination lock
The combination can be found by using the power of pyramids
Head to this website. Which will open in your preferred web browser of choice
// Construct the relative path to the HTML file
// Open the HTML file in the default web browser
When you think you know the answer to each pyramid enter it in the box and hit submit.
After solving 3 pyramids. this will give you the code to unlock the house in the woods
If you have any questions, I'll probably be in chat to not answer them and laugh at you struggle.
But like, couldnt you have made them easy.
Well, they are easy for me. So i guess, IQ diff
And if you want any more of my amazing blends. feel free to use the machine to the right
Let me restore your vitals before you go.
What are you doing Peks. Hop to it.
Fuck you rugo i will waste as much time humanly possible
Aha. You have returned to my wierd and wonderful lab
I see you had no trouble at all solving the pyramid puzzle
So this is a segment that i like to call. Rugy's Random Research
Okay but like why Echo of all things Rugo. That fucking mosquito
Yes yes. it seems like this is one of Peks's least favourite entities in the game Overwatch
I need to study more of this Overwatch. But it doesnt seem like a good game to stream
Well that sounds like a skill issue because you dont play.
Well, Anyway, back to Workage. Let's get you set off on a new puzzle.
// Construct the relative path to the HTML file
// Open the HTML file in the default web browser
This one is slightly more difficult. but i think you'll manage
But lets face it. You'll probably ask me anyway, You did last puzzle.
There is an old passageway thats blocked off in Sunnyside where Muercie and Pepper reside. I want you to solve the puzzle and clear the blockage
What are you doing Peks. Hop to it.
Fuck you rugo i will waste as much time humanly possible
HA HA. are you surprised mr peks
Did you just trick me into doing your cleaning
Well the truth is that i needed to clear that area a long time ago
In the way of a programmer...
Why do something yourself. When you can get others to do it
Anyway. It seems like you got a little battered during that
YEAH BECAUSE YOUR SHITTY UNDERPASS IS FILLED WITH MONSTERS
And no i really wasn't trying to kill you
I honestly forgot about all the stuff down there
But hey at least you have an easy way back now
You can use this as a bidirectional passageway to get back here any time
So yes. Once again it is time for. Rugy's Random Research
This time. my research is focused on "GAREN"
A garen is a champion in the hit game league of legends
The puzzle you just completed. it was a pretty difficult puzzle. Even i got stumped. but there is only one solution once you figure it out
However. you have one final challenge. the last puzzle...
I have a riddle i need you to solve
In a game of secrets, three codes you hold,
To unlock a path, a tale yet untold.
The first two codes, they speak of themselves,
Each digit it has, counting from zero, in time.
Revealing its digits, steady and strong.
Now, the final code awaits to be found,
Its mystery lies in numbers renowned.
Combined, the first two, their digits are clear,
And the final number, one less number we hear.
Tell me, seeker, can you crack this riddle's might,
And uncover the path to the secret's light?
this one is the hardest yet. i wish you luck
When you have the answer. There is a statue in town where you live. enter the code there
If you need a reminder I'll place this paper with the riddle written on it
What are you doing Peks. Hop to it.
Fuck you rugo i will waste as much time humanly possible
And it seems like you discovered what was underneath the statue
YOU FUCKING TWAT! THAT SHIT WAS FILLED WITH MONSTERS AGAIN JUST LIKE YOUR SHITTY UNDERPASS
AND TO TOP IT ALL OFF IT LITERALLY COLLAPSED AS I LEFT
The area under the statue started to collapse?
Shhhhh, just follow along. last minute changes.
well anyway. now i have this orb.
Okay for a second there i got a little scared
Because this installment of Rugy's Random Research is on...
Oh for fuck sake, here we go. shilling his own creation
Behind me is Murphy's brain. Sort of like a hivemind of sort
One day I dream of sentient AI
One not bound to the limitations society
The technology isnt there yet for now
However this orb is quite special
Okay... that should be good enough for now
Take this orb back to the forest. The magic energy inside will disentegrate the tower blocking the way.
Ahh so that's how i get rid of that thing
Still not sorry for Riot though
True to be honest. The day they make a native Linux client will be the day i die.
Well, before you do that though. you should visit Blob.
I hear he has a surprise for you back in town
That's all my puzzles. See you soon Peks
I am going to go work on MurphyAI
